content: 10 cm in stockinette washed and blocked techniques german short row photo tutorial | youtube video yarn any sport or fingering weight yarn that meets gauge if you are substituting stockinette in the body for an alternative st pattern choose a yarn fiber that complements your chosen stitch pattern yarn / size 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 m 479 530 568 619 665 713 772 818 867 yds 523 580 621 677 727 780 844 895 948 meterage/yardage amounts are estimated for a purely stockinette body without bust short row and adjustments amount required will vary if you opt for bust short row or make any adjustments take a peek at what fellow knitters have made with this pattern to see how much yarn they used and to get some design ideas 2 introduction size choose a size 1 based on your upper chest ○ if your bust is larger the range indicated in the size chart do a full bust adjustment fba to add 5cm to the finished bust circumference a ○ if your bust is smaller than the range indicated in the size chart do not size down 2 with at least 3cm ease at the sleeve circumference when measured against your upper arm ○ optionally do a sleeve adjustment sa to add 5cm to the sleeve circumference e if you are in between measurements size up all measurements are in cm size 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 fits upper chest 75-83 84-92 88-97 97-106 106-115 115-122 121-131 130-140 138-147 for bust 75-83 84-92 93-101
